channel.title: Shift Manager of DOOM
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shift Manager of DOOM" - Help with Shift Manager of DOOM Quest

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: The easiest three bloodlines to obtain are your Basic Bloodline, Blood of the Reaper, and Wasteland Disease. Both of them are fairly simple to obtain every season; For Reaper you don't need to obtain True Blood of the Reaper, so you can stop after doing the quest Over the Edge for MC Stripeypants. As for Wasteland Disease, you get that when you get Haus.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Good question.. but it's part of being a Jonin, I am on Season 2 so the test requires 3 bloodlines.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: Try to get to Jonin before you do it. How are you planing to hit diff 13 in Ninjutsu if you can't hit diff 12 in Tai? You should try to get other range boosters like the arena items and see if you can get a polar star from a generous villager (they are costly though so don't expect too much)

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: I'm stuck on the first part of the quest Shift Manager of DOOM. I can't pass the Tai test, I am Level 15 but only have 1 - 11 Range so I fail. What should I do? It's a BurgerNinja quest, so no allies, or jutsu. I already have Chakra Armor
